item.title: Seth
item.content: Seth was the evil brother of Osiris. One day, after Osiris came home from a long journey, Seth finally succeeded in usurping the throne. He murdered Osiris by tricking him into climbing into a box which he then quickly sealed and threw into the Nile. What followed was a dark time. Seth was a cruel and unkind king, not caring for his people. Eventually, he was challenged by Horus, who fought him and restored the rightful line of succession again.
